SELECT Ast.LGCS_CODE AS logiAreaCode ,b.LGCS_AREA_NAME AS logiAreaName ,Ast.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,Ast.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,Ast.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,Ast.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode ,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE AS weightCode ,Ast.GRADE_CODE AS gradeCode ,CONCAT(Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE) AS pdCode ,CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME,'/',Cbr.BREED_NAME,'/',Dfe.FEATURE_NAME,'/',Egr.WEIGHT_NAME) AS pdName FROM pd_logiarea AS Ast LEFT JOIN md_logistics_area b ON b.LGCS_AREA_CODE = Ast.LGCS_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASSES Bcl ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Bcl.CLASSES_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_machining mac ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND mac.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_BREED Cbr ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Cbr.CLASSES_CODE AND Cbr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Cbr.BREED_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_FEATURE Dfe ON Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Dfe.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Dfe.CLASSES_CODE AND Dfe.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Dfe.BREED_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_weight Egr ON Ast.WEIGHT_CODE =Egr.WEIGHT_CODE AND Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Egr.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Egr.CLASSES_CODE AND Egr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Egr.BREED_CODE ORDER BY Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE,Ast.GRADE_CODE
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}

SELECT count(1) FROM pd_logiarea AS Ast LEFT JOIN md_logistics_area b ON b.LGCS_AREA_CODE = Ast.LGCS_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CLASSES Bcl ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Bcl.CLASSES_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_machining mac ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND mac.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_BREED Cbr ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Cbr.CLASSES_CODE AND Cbr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Cbr.BREED_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_FEATURE Dfe ON Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Dfe.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Dfe.CLASSES_CODE AND Dfe.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Dfe.BREED_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_weight Egr ON Ast.WEIGHT_CODE =Egr.WEIGHT_CODE AND Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Egr.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Egr.CLASSES_CODE AND Egr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Egr.BREED_CODE
